thread.title: Google takes the camera out of your hand

title: Google takes the camera out of your hand
text:
Google takes the camera out of your hand 5:11pm GMT - 01:47 
Google is betting on babies, dogs, and artificial intelligence for a new camera it's launching this week called Google Clips. Reuters reporter Paresh Dave gives it a try. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Google is betting on babies, dogs, and artificial intelligence for a new camera it's launching this week called Google Clips. Reuters reporter Paresh Dave gives it a try. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2CKrst3
